personal.name: Alvin Adefuin
personal.title: AI Software Developer
personal.bio:
Hey ðŸ‘‹
I'm Alvin, an AI Software Developer at Journey Better Business Group Inc. with expertise in both frontend and backend development. My proficiency in Agile methodologies and project management, coupled with a commitment to continuous learning and teamwork, has empowered me to drive innovation and contribute effectively to various projects. I love building AI-powered solutions with modern technologies.

current.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

achievements: Best in Thesis Awardee for KASAKA Agricultural Application

experience.description: Developing Journey AI features with expertise in both frontend and backend technologies. Implemented RAG for Q&A, enhanced frontend with JavaScript and React/Preact, and managed backend services with Python and Flask.

Contributed to web application development and team collaboration. Designed web application UI for optimal user experience, integrated web APIs, resolved Jira tickets, and collaborated with development teams.

funFacts: Best in Thesis Awardee for KASAKA Agricultural Application
Developed RAG-based Q&A system for business intelligence
Worked on both frontend (React/Preact) and backend (Python/Flask)
personality.workingStyle: Agile, collaborative, and focused on continuous improvement with strong technical execution
personality.motivation: Building innovative AI-powered solutions that solve real-world problems and drive business value

internship.workStyle: Fast learner, team player, problem solver with hands-on experience in AI development and full-stack systems
internship.goals: Join an innovative team building AI-powered solutions. I want to contribute to meaningful projects while growing my skills in enterprise-level development and scaling AI systems.

projects.title: KASAKA: Agricultural Web & Mobile App
projects.description: Agricultural mapping application for monitoring rice plant development stages using the NaÃ¯ve Bayes Algorithm. Led the development as Thesis Leader, earning Best in Thesis award.

projects.title: AI-Powered Natural Language Search System
projects.description: Developed an intelligent search system for 34,607 unique products using single-call architecture with RAG category classification via Railway middleware. Implemented hybrid semantic and keyword search with OpenAI embeddings, achieving 84.6% accuracy in category detection.

projects.title: AI Development at JBBGI
projects.description: Contributing to AI-powered solutions and full-stack development for business intelligence applications. Working with modern technologies across frontend and backend systems.

projects.title: SBCC Financial System
projects.description: Church Financial Management System with Google Forms integration for streamlined financial tracking and reporting. Built to help manage church finances efficiently with automated data collection and analysis.

projects.title: Site Asset Downloader
projects.description: A web-based tool to automatically extract and download images, videos, and other media assets from any website. Simplifies the process of bulk downloading media content for web development and research purposes.

projects.title: LUCS Forum
projects.description: A UI/UX design project created at age 19, experimenting with HTML and CSS to build a forum interface. An early exploration of web design principles and frontend development.

projects.title: eDocx
projects.description: A web-based tool that simplifies the document request process for students. Streamlines administrative workflows by providing an easy-to-use interface for requesting and managing academic documents.

awards.title: Best in Thesis
awards.description: Awarded for the KASAKA Agricultural Web & Mobile Application thesis project
